com.xith3d.render
Interface CanvasPeer

All Known Implementing Classes:
CanvasPeerBase
public interface CanvasPeer

The canvas peer represents the physical location of rendering. It is implemented specifically according to the underlying API. JOGL and LWJGL both use radically different mechanisms for managing their screens, so we need to abstract that properly.

Copyright (c) 2003 David Yazel Copyright (c) 2003

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
David Yazel
